resolution: → Use the unseal key to unseal Vault.
→ Verify network connectivity and Vault address.
→ Check latency or increase timeout settings.
→ Investigate lease revocation and renew token.
→ Generate a new token or log in again.
→ Generate a new token or refresh the current one.
→ Investigate token renewal process and retry.
→ Check if the token is still valid and authorized.
→ This token has been revoked. Generate a new one.
